audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear functional optimization - data extraction and migration automation. Highly replicable pattern for similar data migration projects across organizations.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (Dentsu), specific quantified metric (60 robots, 30 days, 125,000 hours saved), appears to be from authoritative source.

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage IT resilience and risk

audited_claims.notes: Strong Tier 1 case with clear automation of existing data management processes and substantial quantified savings.

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Excellent functional optimization example - timesheet reporting process improvement from 1 day to 10 minutes. Highly replicable across organizations with similar reporting requirements.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific, measurable improvement with clear before/after metrics. Named organization and detailed process description.

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage human resources planning, policies, and strategies

audited_claims.notes: Exemplary Tier 1 case showing dramatic efficiency gains in routine administrative processes.

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear optimization of Media Operations functions. Pattern replicable for other media/advertising operations teams.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization, specific quantified projection (850+ hours annually), from hackathon context adds credibility.
audited_claims.notes: Strong Tier 1 case with projected savings in media operations processes.

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Describes optimization of multiple administrative functions (reporting, invoicing, timesheets). Highly replicable patterns across organizations.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization, specific process types identified, provides concrete examples of automation targets.

apqc_functions.name: Process accounts payable and expense reimbursements
Develop and manage IT resilience and risk

audited_claims.notes: Good supporting evidence for multiple functional optimizations, particularly strong in financial processes.

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Describes optimization of analysis/insight generation processes. Replicable pattern for analytics functions.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization and dramatic quantified improvement (90% reduction), but 'time-to-insight' is somewhat vague. Source authority unclear from this excerpt.
audited_claims.notes: Strong efficiency claim but needs verification of source credibility and more specific definition of 'time-to-insight' metric.

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Describes optimization of campaign operations and cost reduction. Replicable for marketing operations.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization but claims are qualitative without specific metrics ('faster', 'dropped', 'freed'). Lacks quantified evidence.
audited_claims.notes: Clear functional optimization described but lacks specific metrics to substantiate claims. Would benefit from quantified evidence.

tier_verification: Correctly classified as tier 1. All claims describe optimization of existing business functions (data processing, reporting, media operations, campaign management) rather than business model innovation or new revenue streams.
